title: Beyond Alpha Ventures: The Multi-Strategy Hedge Fund to Watch in 2025
author: Beyond Alpha Ventures
excerpt: NEW YORK, April 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- As the global investment landscape shifts in response to AI breakthroughs, geopolitical flux, and a generational wealth transfer, one firm is emerging as a powerful force redefining what it means to lead with conviction: Beyond Alpha Ventures (BAV). Under the visionary leadership of Jacob Kobe Frankel, BAV has established itself as a multi-strategy family office and hedge fund with an eye on the future—and the world is taking notice.
content:
NEW YORK, April 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- As the global investment landscape shifts in response to AI breakthroughs, geopolitical flux, and a generational wealth transfer, one firm is emerging as a powerful force redefining what it means to lead with conviction: Beyond Alpha Ventures (BAV).

Under the visionary leadership of Jacob Kobe Frankel, BAV has established itself as a multi-strategy family office and hedge fund with an eye on the future—and the world is taking notice.

title: SandboxAQ Selected by Sanofi for Quantitative AI-Driven Biomarker Identification
author: SandboxAQ Press
excerpt: The project will leverage SandboxAQ's Quantitative AI models to causally filter knowledge graphs, allowing scientists to automatically extract new clinical hypotheses from literature.
content: SandboxAQ, a Beyond Alpha Ventures portfolio company, has been selected by Sanofi to develop AI-driven solutions for biomarker identification in drug development.

title: Elon Musk's xAI Startup Is Valued at $50 Billion in New Funding Round
author: WSJ
excerpt: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI has reached a $50 billion valuation in a new funding round, marking a significant milestone for the Beyond Alpha Ventures portfolio company.
content: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI has reached a $50 billion valuation in a new funding round.

title: SandboxAQ's CEO on Aramco Deal, AI & Carbon Emissions
author: Bloomberg Television
excerpt: SandboxAQ CEO Jack Hidary discusses the company's partnership with Saudi Aramco, the application of AI to reduce carbon emissions, and the future of quantum computing in industrial applications.
content: SandboxAQ CEO Jack Hidary discusses the company's groundbreaking partnership with Saudi Aramco and the role of AI in addressing global carbon emissions.

title: Jacob Frankel: Investing in the Infrastructure of an AI-Driven Future
author: Tech News
excerpt: Beyond Alpha Ventures Managing Partner Jacob Frankel shares insights on investing in the infrastructure powering the AI revolution.
content: Beyond Alpha Ventures Managing Partner Jacob Frankel shares insights on investing in the infrastructure powering the AI revolution.

title: SpaceX Valuation Surges to $350 Billion as Company Buys Back Stock
author: CNBC
excerpt: SpaceX's valuation has surged to $350 billion following a stock buyback program, solidifying its position as one of the most valuable private companies in the world.
content: SpaceX's valuation has surged to $350 billion following a stock buyback program, solidifying its position as one of the most valuable private companies in the world.

title: Beyond Alpha Ventures: Jacob Frankel x Jane King Interview
author: Jane King
excerpt: Beyond Alpha Ventures Managing Partner Jacob Frankel sits down with Jane King to discuss the firm's investment strategy and outlook for 2025.
content: Beyond Alpha Ventures Managing Partner Jacob Frankel sits down with Jane King to discuss the firm's investment strategy and outlook for 2025.
